DOC.brief_title: Longitudinal Follow-up After C1 Implant Stabilization Values
DOC.detailed_description: 10 Patients require standard implant installation maxilla recruit study . Inclusion criterion : - Men woman age 18 . - The patient willing , available attend follow-up meeting . - The patient accept sign inform consent form begin study . Exclusion criterion : - Pregnant woman woman breast feeding . - Patient suffering untreated periodontal disease . - Patient smoke 10 cigarette per day . - Alcohol abuse . - Patient suffer either uncontrolled Diabetes , Osteoporosis , rheumatic arthritis , neoplastic pre-cancerous condition , condition limit standard implant installation procedure . - Patient need bone augmentation prior . - Immediate implant placement restoration . Course study : Every patient find eligible study need go CT scan implantation site ( require ) . Before operation 2 gr AMOXICILLIN ( 600mg CLYNDAMYCIN - case allergy ) administer . The implant instal standard approach local anesthesia , customary do . The implant ' installation torque record . At end operation patient instructed rinse mouth Chlorhexidine solution one week . Eventually implant restore loaded common 3 month heal period . Follow-up appointment : The patient monitor period 3 month . The patient instructed return follow-up examination 2 , 4 , 7 , 14 , 21 , 28 , 45 , 60 90 day operation . On meet implant ' ISQ value measure use 'Osstell ' appliance . An x-ray intra-oral radiogram take right end operation end follow-up ( i.e day 90 ) .
